etymologies: late 18th century (in crèche (sense 2 of the noun)): French (see also cratch)

definitions: a model or tableau representing the scene of Jesus Christ's birth, displayed in homes or public places at Christmas.
shortDefinitions: model or tableau representing scene of Jesus Christ's birth

definitions: a nursery where babies and young children are cared for during the working day.
shortDefinitions: nursery where babies and young children are cared for during working day
